Модели¶

class main.models.Category(*args, **kwargs)¶

Базовые классы: django.db.models.base.Model

Категории

Параметры

  • id (AutoField) – Id

  • category_name (CharField) – Название категории

  • description (TextField) – Описание категории

exception DoesNotExist¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

category_name¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

description¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>¶
product_set¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of a many-to-many relation.

In the example:

class Pizza(Model):
    toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

Pizza.toppings and Topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class main.models.Price(*args, **kwargs)¶

Базовые классы: django.db.models.base.Model

Цены продавцов

Параметры

  • id (AutoField) – Id

  • seller_id (ForeignKey to Seller) – Продавец, установивший цену

  • product_id (ForeignKey to Product) – Товар, на который установлена цена

  • price (FloatField) – Установленная продавцом цена на товар

  • article (CharField) – Артикул товара у продавца

  • comment (TextField) – Примечание к цене

exception DoesNotExist¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

comment¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>¶
price¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

product¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

product_id¶
seller¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

seller_id¶
class main.models.Product(*args, **kwargs)¶

Базовые классы: django.db.models.base.Model

Товары

Параметры

  • id (AutoField) – Id

  • product_name (CharField) – Название товара

  • product_type (CharField) – Вид товара. Вибирается из вариантов

  • description (TextField) – Описание товара

  • certified (BooleanField) – Признак того, что товар нужно сертифицировать

  • product_image (ImageField) – Ссылка на иллюстрацию к товару

  • noticed (BooleanField) – Отметка о том, что товар был упмянут в рассылке о новинках

  • category (ManyToManyField) – Категории, к которым относится товар

  • tag (ManyToManyField) – Связанные с товаром тэги

exception DoesNotExist¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

TYPECHOICES = (('service', 'Услуга'), ('item', 'Предмет'))¶

Варианты значений для поля Вид товара

category¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of a many-to-many relation.

In the example:

class Pizza(Model):
    toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

Pizza.toppings and Topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>¶
product_image¶

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

product_name¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

product_type¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

sellers¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

tag¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of a many-to-many relation.

In the example:

class Pizza(Model):
    toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

Pizza.toppings and Topping.pizzas are ManyToManyDescriptor instances.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class main.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)¶

Базовые классы: django.db.models.base.Model

Профили пользователей

Параметры

  • id (AutoField) – Id

  • user_id (OneToOneField to User) – Ссылка на пользователя из станадартной модели Django

  • age (SmallIntegerField) – Возраст пользователя

  • profile_image (ImageField) – Ссылка на иллюстрацию пользователя

exception DoesNotExist¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

age¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>¶
profile_image¶

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

user¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a one-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Restaurant(Model):
    place = OneToOneField(Place, related_name='restaurant')

Restaurant.place is a ForwardOneToOneDescriptor instance.

user_id¶

class main.models.ViewCounter(*args, **kwargs)¶

Базовые классы: django.db.models.base.Model

Счетчик просмотров

Параметры

  • id (AutoField) – Id

  • page_url (CharField) – Просмотренный адрес

  • view_count (IntegerField) – Количество просмотров

exception DoesNotExist¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Базовые классы: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

static count_view(page_url)¶

Инкремент просмотра :param page_url: Просматриваемый url :type page_url: строка до 255 символов

static get_count(page_url)¶

Получение количества просмотров :param page_url: Просматриваемый url :type page_url: строка до 255 символов

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.
